name: Ocean Odyssey (Neo Zhang)
description:
Imagine:  you're a sushi chef, but your family gets turned into sushi. What would you do? Take on the role of Miyo, the Sushi Chef, and embark on a journey to avenge your fallen loved ones at the hands of the fish invasion in this roguelike action game. How to Play the Game Meet the Team!
